snippet.title: Grand Theft Auto 2  - GBC Longplay/Walkthrough #32 [720p]
snippet.description:
Gameboy Color: Grand Theft Auto 2

Rating: 2.5/5

I had a lot more fun with this one over the first as the districts are quite lively and there were far less glitches than the first GTA for the GBC. However the game isn't glitch free as there are many times where you will have to quit out and enter a password to save yourself from being stuck or if you play long enough all the cars will dissappear from the wrold. There is also significant slow down in GTA 2 when a lot is happening which actually makes the driving easier but I owuld dtill say it is a negative. Now at the end of my longplay I pretty much just run over people to go from 4.2 million oints to 5 million because I couldn't get the final Russian mission to work right and no matter what respect levels I had for any of the gangs I couldn't find any new missions. I had fun with this one and despite all of its glitches and problems I still enjoyed playing it.
